name: ENTEMON (Expanded Gamejam Release )
description:
this is a private and expanded version of ENTEMON, a game where you play as in insect traveling your home valley to reach the palace hive of queen waspra, who plans on invading the valley and eliminating all who oppose her, including you. When I say “expanded” I don’t mean by a lot. There are only 2 bosses in total (as of this release) and you can’t travel back and forth across locations. However it follows the theme of evolution pretty well as there is a hidden story beyond what you are told up front. I can’t tell you everything but I can tell you three vague clues: Primitive period, toxic era, and present day. But not OUR present day.

Controls: left arrow: move left, right arrow: move right, up arrow: move up, down arrow: move down, E to interact, I to open inventory, backspace to close inventory, Double click attack moves to attack
